## Who I am ?

I am currently associate professor at the [University of Bordeaux](https://www.u-bordeaux.fr/) since September 2018. I do my research activity in [Biostatistic team](https://www.bordeaux-population-health.center/les-equipes/biostatistique/) from [Bordeaux population heath center (INSERM UMR1219)](https://www.bordeaux-population-health.center/en/). 
I teach in the [Unité de Formation Mathématiques et Intéractions](https://math-interactions.u-bordeaux.fr/)
It rocks and I'm rockupied !

From January 2020, I am head of the second year of MIASHS bachelor's degree of the University of Bordeaux.

## Software

* **BQt** is a downloadable R-package. This package concerns the estimation of quantile regression joint models, linear quantile mixed models, and linear quantile regression, using Bayesian approach.
[[GitHub]](https://www.ahajournals.org/doi/10.1161/HYPERTENSIONAHA.120.16807)
* **JMcuR** is a downloadable R-package from GitHub. This package includes all programs associated with the published research in Barbieri and Legrand (2019).
[[GitHub]](https://www.ahajournals.org/doi/10.1161/HYPERTENSIONAHA.120.16807)
* **QoLSEM** is a downloadable R-package from GitHub. This package includes programs associated with the published research in Barbieri A, Tami M et al. (2018).
[[GitHub]](https://www.ahajournals.org/doi/10.1161/HYPERTENSIONAHA.120.16807)
